home.title: Welcome to Senior Care Plus
home.subtitle: Comprehensive elderly care management to ensure the best care and attention for seniors. Integrates health monitoring, location tracking, and smart reminder features.

emergency.description: Quick emergency assistance signal to ensure timely help

confirms.removeDevice: Are you sure you want to remove this device?

monitoringDebug.title: MQTT Debug Panel
monitoringDebug.instruction1: This debug panel displays real-time MQTT messages
monitoringDebug.instruction2: Messages can be filtered by topic or device name
monitoringDebug.instruction3: Click copy button to copy data to clipboard
monitoringDebug.instruction4: Supports exporting debug data as JSON file
monitoringDebug.instruction5: Messages are automatically updated, retaining maximum specified quantity

emptyState.goToResidentManagement: Go to Resident Management to set up devices

confirms.resetSettings: Are you sure you want to reset all health monitoring settings? This action cannot be undone!

temperature.title: Temperature Monitoring
temperature.subtitle: Real-time monitoring of elderly temperature changes to detect health abnormalities in time

cloudDeviceMonitoring.title: Cloud Device Monitoring
cloudDeviceMonitoring.selectCloudDevice: Select cloud device for detailed monitoring
cloudDeviceMonitoring.simulatorFormat: Simulator sends data in content: "300B" format
cloudDeviceMonitoring.dataFields: Data contains MAC and "skin temp" fields
cloudDeviceMonitoring.clickToExpand: Click on data below to expand and view full content
cloudDeviceMonitoring.condition3: skin_temp field can be empty or 0 (condition relaxed)
cloudDeviceMonitoring.condition4: diaper DV1 type data currently does not create device records

temperatureChart.title: Temperature Trend Chart

temperatureRecords.selectedDeviceNoData: Selected device has no temperature data

connectionStatus.hint: Hint: Local MQTT needs to run on localhost:9001, Cloud MQTT will automatically connect to HiveMQ cloud service

deviceConditions.abnormalWarning: Heart rate > 100 BPM or < 60 BPM will trigger abnormal warning

cloudDeviceMonitoring.dataFields: Data contains MAC and humidity related fields

cloudDeviceMonitoring.condition3: humi, temp, battery level fields can be empty or 0 (condition relaxed)

uwbLocation.title: Nursing Home Management
uwbLocation.subtitle: UWB positioning system field, floor and gateway configuration management

mapControls.mouseInstructions: Scroll to zoom, drag to move on the map

messages.addFloorFirst: Please add a floor first to configure gateways

uwbLocation.uploadInstructions: Please upload {{floorName}}'s indoor map. Supports PNG, JPG, SVG formats.
uwbLocation.dragImageHint: or drag and drop images to this area
uwbLocation.originInstructions: Please click any position on the map to set it as the coordinate origin, then input the actual coordinates of that point. It is usually recommended to choose the corner of a room or corridor as a reference point.
uwbLocation.clickMapSetNewPosition: Click Map to Set New Position for {{name}}
uwbLocation.scaleInstructions: Please click two points on the map, then enter the actual distance between these two points. The system will automatically calculate the conversion ratio between pixels and meters.
uwbLocation.clickTwoPointsSetScale: Click Two Points to Set Scale
uwbLocation.enterActualDistance: Enter the actual distance between the two points
uwbLocation.simulatorSendsGatewayTopic: Simulator sends content: "gateway topic" format data
uwbLocation.dataContainsGatewayIdAndName: Data contains "gateway id" and name fields
uwbLocation.clickDataToExpand: Click data below to expand and view full content
uwbLocation.mustHaveGatewayIdAndName: Must have "gateway id" and name fields
uwbLocation.uwbJoinedAnd5VPluggedOnline: UWB Joined: "yes" and 5V plugged: "yes" considered online
uwbLocation.addDiscoveredGatewayToFloor: Add the gateway discovered from the cloud (ID: {{id}}) to the selected floor
uwbLocation.gatewayAnchorConfigTopicCorrect: Gateway's anchor configuration topic is correct
uwbLocation.simulatorSendsAnchorConfigData: Simulator sends content: "config", node: "ANCHOR" format data
uwbLocation.dataContainsIdAndName: Data contains id and name fields

anchorPairing.title: Anchor Pairing Management
anchorPairing.selectGatewayFirst: Please select a gateway above to manage anchors
anchorPairing.noOnlineGateways: No online local gateways available for pairing
anchorPairing.noPairedAnchors: No paired anchors under this gateway

debug.clickDataToExpand: Click data below to expand and view full content
debug.mustHaveIdAndName: Must have id and name fields
debug.viewRawAckData: View Raw Anchor MQTT Data (Debug) - Ack Data

anchorPairing.noAvailableGateways: No available gateways on this floor

anchorCalibration.title: Calibrate {{name}}
anchorCalibration.mapClickInstruction: Directly click the map on the left to set {{name}}'s new position
anchorCalibration.manualInputInstruction: Or manually enter precise coordinate values below
anchorCalibration.pixelCoordinatesHint: 💡 Enter pixel coordinates on the image, system will automatically convert to real coordinates
anchorCalibration.quickOperationDescription: Click left map = Quick setting | Manual input = Precise coordinates
anchorCalibration.sendToCloudQuestion: Do you want to send the new coordinates to the cloud hardware?
anchorCalibration.sendToCloudInstruction: Click "Confirm" to further configure parameters and send
anchorCalibration.serialNoRange: Range: 1306-9999, automatically increments after each send
anchorCalibration.coordinatesSentToCloud: The new coordinates of {{name}} have been sent to the cloud hardware

tagManagement.title: Tag Device Management
tagManagement.subtitle: Manage UWB positioning tag devices, including personnel tags, equipment tags, and asset tags

tagList.noTagsUnderGateway: No tag devices under this gateway
tagList.gatewayMessageLocationTopics: 1. Gateway's message and location topics are correct
tagList.simulatorSendsInfoLocation: 2. Simulator sends content: "info"/"location", node: "TAG" format data
tagList.dataContainsFields: 3. Data contains id, battery level, position, time and other fields
tagList.clickDataToExpand: Click data below to expand and view full content
tagList.locationContainsPosition: • location contains position and time information
